text: The list of shipwrecks in August 1831 includes ships sunk, foundered, grounded, or otherwise lost during August 1831. ==2 August== ==8 August== ==9 August== ==11 August== ==13 August== ==16 August== ==17 August== ==18 August== ==19 August== ==20 August== ==22 August== ==23 August== ==25 August== ==26 August== ==27 August== ==31 August== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1831-08
title: List of shipwrecks in August 1831
